title: 'Dictator for a Day' Statement
summary: During a Fox News town hall, Trump refused to rule out acting as a dictator, repeatedly saying 'except for Day One' when pressed by Sean Hannity.
keyFacts: Hannity: 'You would never abuse power as retribution against anybody?' Trump: 'Except for Day One'
Hannity (pressing): 'You're not going to be a dictator, are you?' Trump: 'No, no, no, other than Day One'
When given multiple opportunities to deny dictatorial ambitions, repeatedly said 'except for Day One'
Trump: 'We're closing the border and we're drilling, drilling, drilling. After that, I'm not a dictator'
Democracy experts called it 'the clearest authoritarian threat ever made by an American presidential candidate'
Later doubled down at rallies, joking about the statement rather than clarifying

sources.text: Fox News town hall transcript, December 5, 2023
